easyStandard.skull: -X. X is the highest number of doom on a _Cultist_ enemy.
easyStandard.cultist: -2. If you do not succeed by at least 1, take 1 damage.
easyStandard.tablet: -2. If you do not succeed by at least 1, place 1 doom on the nearest _Cultist_ enemy.
easyStandard.elderThing: -2. If you fail, lose 1 of your clues.

hardExpert.skull: -X. X is the total number of doom in play.
hardExpert.cultist: -2. If you do not succeed by at least 2, take 1 direct damage.
hardExpert.tablet: -2. If you do not succeed by at least 2, place 1 doom on each _Cultist_ enemy.
hardExpert.elderThing: -3. If you fail, lose 1 of your clues.

xp.bonus: Gains insight into the schemes of the Brotherhood.
